description: Lists the Amazon Web Services accounts that are designated as delegated administrators in this organization. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account or by a member account that is a delegated administrator.

parameters.name: ServicePrincipal
parameters.description: Specifies a service principal name. If specified, then the operation lists the delegated administrators only for the specified service. If you don't specify a service principal, the operation lists all delegated administrators for all services in your organization.

nested_items.name: DelegatedAdministrators
nested_items.description: The list of delegated administrators in your organization.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the delegated administrator's account.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delegated administrator's account.

nested_items.name: Email
nested_items.description: The email address that is associated with the delegated administrator's Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the delegated administrator's account.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the delegated administrator's account in the organization.

nested_items.name: JoinedMethod
nested_items.description: The method by which the delegated administrator's account joined the organization.

nested_items.name: JoinedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The date when the delegated administrator's account became a part of the organization.

nested_items.name: DelegationEnabledDate
nested_items.description: The date when the account was made a delegated administrator.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null.
